description: Field based project with industry relevance that allow students to apply their previously acquired knowledge, design skills & practices to practical applications. Students completing the course in a single semester enrol in ENGG7802. Students who commence in Semester 1 enrol in ENGG7803 for Sem 1 (Part A) and Sem 2 (Part B); students who commence in Semester 2 enrol in ENGG7804 for Sem 2 (Part A) & the following Sem 1 (Part B).
prerequisites: Admission to MEngSc suite & Permission of Head of School
restricted: Admission to MEngSc suite & Permission of Head of School
